alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 22 at 3:54PM MDT until October 23 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT SUNDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 9 PM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet and East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 6 AM to 9 PM MDT Sunday. For the Wind Advisory, until 6 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds expected this afternoon and evening, but the strongest winds are expected on Sunday. Winds slowly subside on Sunday night. .
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet
